name: strava_scrape_athlete
description: Scrape a Strava athlete profile. Returns name, location, stats, and recent activities.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="AthleteName"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const loc = document.querySelector('[class*="location"], .athlete-location')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const stats = {}; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="Stat"], .inline-stats .stat, .athlete-stats span').forEach(el => { const lbl = el.querySelector('[class*="Label"], .stat-subtext')?.textContent?.trim()?.toLowerCase()||''; const val = el.querySelector('[class*="Value"], .stat-text')?.textContent?.trim()||''; if(lbl&&val) stats[lbl]=val; }); const activities = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="Activity"], .feed-entry')).slice(0,10).map(el => ({ title: el.querySelector('a, h3')?.textContent?.trim()||'', date: el.querySelector('time, .timestamp')?.textContent?.trim()||'' })); return { athlete_id: '{{athlete_id}}', name, location: loc, stats, recent_activities: activities, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
